title: Tour Montparnasse is One of Paris’s Uglier Landmarks. It’s Getting a Makeover.
summary_full: The Tour Montparnasse is one of Paris’s least-loved landmarks. After half a century, it’s finally being remodeled.
summary_public: The Tour Montparnasse is one of Paris’s least-loved landmarks. After half a century, it’s finally being remodeled.
